body: I see, thanks. Programs which import the net package and need to be statically linked cannot migrate to 1.4. Is there some reason, in principle, why such static linking cannot be supported in 1.4.x or does commit [8c3005c](https://github.com/golang/go/commit/8c3005c4929e26cba74c80703123e150fa3fda1a) preclude such a solution?
